headline: Is Emerson Electric Co. (EMR) the Best Industrial Machinery Stock to Buy Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Industrial Machinery Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Emerson Electric Co.
